metadata.title: CVE-2022-23094 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Libreswan 4.2 through 4.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (NULL pointer dereference and daemon crash) via a crafted IKEv1packet because pluto/ikev1.c wrongly expects that a state object exists.This is fixed in 4.6.

criterions.comment: libreswan package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
